aboutText.paragraph1: R√∏svik is a first-person survival game set in a harsh, remote Northern European town, blending elements of fantasy, mythology, and exploration.
aboutText.paragraph2: Players assume the role of a surveyor from Den Norske Turistforening, tasked with investigating the abandoned, off-grid settlement of R√∏svik ‚Äî once home to outcasts, faith-healers, and pagan holdouts. Officially, the settlement was abandoned due to ‚Äúunstable terrain,‚Äù but the locals talk of something far more sinister.
aboutText.paragraph3: The gameplay centers around scavenging for resources, unlocking mystical powers, and interacting with an atmospheric, dangerous, and emergent environment.
aboutText.paragraph4: As players uncover ancient relics, geological samples, and lost equipment, they will gradually gain access to supernatural abilities, and be forced to navigate the cursed landscape ‚Äî while avoiding mythological threats lurking in the dark.

gameLoopText.paragraph2: Crafting new gear in the camp
gameLoopText.paragraph3: Going out into new areas with your newly crafted gear
gameLoopText.paragraph4: Encountering a different types of monsters
gameLoopText.paragraph5: Tension based decision making (fight or flight)
gameLoopText.paragraph7: Unlocking new areas with your powers
gameLoopText.paragraph8: Dying and respawning in your rune-circle, in basecamp

about.lowerSection: A team of students dedicated to creating challenging, complex, or technically ambitious projects. Our work is often marked by creativity, resilience, and a passion for pushing the limits of interactive entertainment.

demo.mainText: Do you think you could survive?
